Passive.Name: Rock Shock
Passive.Description: When an Enemy Takes Damage from Tower, they are Shocked and the Shock Deals 50 -> 200 damage per 0.5 second to them for 1 second

Passive.Name: Cone AoE Slow
Passive.Description: Enemies In Cone 30 Degress Is Being Slowed By 60% For 0.5 Seconds

Passive.Name: Burn
Passive.Description: When Tower Attacks Enemy Receives 1200 -> 2400 Damage Per 1 Seconds For 3 Seconds

Passive.Name: Recursive Volley
Passive.Description: Attacks strike twice and stun enemies for 0.25 seconds
